special_powers.name: Reign of Terror
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, choose a friendly character. Once per turn, when that character rolls for Leadership you may reroll the result. If that character is named Dr. Doom, they increase their roll for Leadership by +1.

special_powers.name: Consolation
special_powers.description: Once per game, when a friendly character would roll for Leadership, you may choose that they automatically succeed.

special_powers.name: Unstable Molecules
special_powers.description: [This map has orange zones labeled 1-4.] When a friendly character in a numbered orange zone attacks or is attacked, modify their corresponding combat value +1. 1=Attack 2=Range 3=Defense 4=Damage. If that character is named Mr. Fantastic, you can choose which combat value (except Speed) to modify.

special_powers.name: Consolation
special_powers.description: At the beginning of the game, generate 4 Past Experiment markers anywhere on the map not within 4 squares of a starting area. Friendly characters occupying those markers modify attack +1.
